name: api_rendering_Projector
description: A script interface for a projector component.

properties.name: aspectRatio
properties.description: The aspect ratio of the projection.

properties.name: farClipPlane
properties.description: The far clipping plane distance.

properties.name: fieldOfView
properties.description: The field of view of the projection in degrees.

properties.name: ignoreLayers
properties.description: Which object layers are ignored by the projector.

properties.name: material
properties.description: The material that will be projected onto every object.

properties.name: nearClipPlane
properties.description: The near clipping plane distance.

properties.name: orthographic
properties.description: Is the projection orthographic (true) or perspective (false)?

properties.name: orthographicSize
properties.description: Projection's half-size when in orthographic mode.

properties.name: BroadcastMessage
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object or any of its children.

properties.name: CompareTag
properties.description: Checks the GameObject's tag against the defined tag.

properties.name: GetComponent
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified.

properties.name: GetComponentInChildren
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, or any

properties.name: GetComponentIndex
properties.description: Gets the index of the component on its parent GameObject.

properties.name: GetComponentInParent
properties.description: Gets a reference to a component of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, or any

properties.name: GetComponents
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified.

properties.name: GetComponentsInChildren
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, and a

properties.name: GetComponentsInParent
properties.description: Gets references to all components of type T on the same GameObject as the component specified, and a

properties.name: SendMessage
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object.

properties.name: SendMessageUpwards
properties.description: Calls the method named methodName on every MonoBehaviour in this game object and on every ancestor o

properties.name: TryGetComponent
properties.description: Gets the component of the specified type, if it exists.
